name: Thai
description: The official national cuisine of Thailand is known for its spicy and sour flavors, with dishes like Tom Yum soup, Green Curry, and Pad Thai

name: American
description: The cuisine of the United States is diverse and influenced by many different cultures, with popular dishes like burgers, hot dogs, and apple pie

name: Chinese
description: Chinese cuisine is known for its variety and complexity, with dishes like Peking duck, Xiaolongbao, and Kung Pao chicken

name: Mexican
description: Mexican cuisine is known for its bold flavors and spices, with popular dishes like tacos, burritos, and quesadillas

name: Indian
description: Indian cuisine is known for its rich and complex spices, with popular dishes like curry, tandoori chicken, and naan bread

name: Spanish
description: Spanish cuisine is known for its use of olive oil, garlic, and seafood, with popular dishes like paella, tortilla, and gazpacho

name: Italian
description: Italian cuisine is known for its pasta dishes, pizzas, and rich sauces, with popular dishes like spaghetti Bolognese, pizza margherita, and lasagna
